info.title: Survey Service
info.description: Microservice for designing and administering surveys.

parameters.name: newSurvey
parameters.description: Definition of a new survey.  Existing questions have 'id' only and new questions have other fields.

get.description: Only returns id and name fields.

patch.summary: Updates or translates survey text fields

get.summary: returns the number of users that have submitted an answer to the requested survey

post.description: This persists answers to survey questions.  Old answers are soft deleted.  For each question for which there is no answer property, any existing answer will be soft deleted.

get.summary: List answers multi user export ready

post.summary: Searches all answers and returns count of matching users
Searches all answers and returns count of matching users using identifiers
Searches all answers and returns user ids
Searches all answers and returns user ids
Searches all answers and returns federated answers
Searches all answers and returns count of matching users

patch.summary: Updates or translates question text fields
Updates or translates reset password text fields

get.description: Only returns id, name and status fields.

parameters.name: user-survey-status
parameters.description: Status of survey completion by user

get.summary: Gets answered survey and its status

post.summary: Create answers and set status for survey

parameters.name: assessment-answers-status
parameters.description: status of assessment completion by user

post.description: This persists assessment answers.  Old answers are soft deleted.  For each question for which there is no answer property, any existing answer will be soft deleted.
This persists assessment answers.  Old answers are soft deleted.  For each question for which there is no answer property, any existing answer will be soft deleted.

parameters.description: survey Id that of the assessments' answers that will be returned
parameters.name: survey-id

parameters.description: questionId filter on the assessments' anwers that will be returned
parameters.name: question-id

parameters.description: sectionId filter on the assessments' answers that will be returned
parameters.name: section-id

parameters.name: include-comments

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: File to be stored in db

newSurveyQuestion.description: Describes either a brand new question (no 'id') or an existing question ('id' only with 'required').

content.description: Base64 encoded binary or text content
